filterable_text_client_v0.0.1.description: Text Client that adds a new `Filtered` tab where the displayed messages can be controlled through commands. The main `Archipelago` tab will display all messages as normal. Commands: ``` /toggle_chat Toggle chat messages on/off /toggle_connections Toggle connection (join/leave) messages on/off /toggle_items Toggle item send/receive messages on/off /toggle_other_player_items Toggle displaying item send/receive messages for players other than yourself /toggle_progression_only Toggle showing only progression items in send/receive messages /toggle_deathlink Toggle showing deathlink death messages ``` The toggled messages filtering is not persisted, so will need to be set up again when the client is restarted.
filterable_text_client_v0.0.1.title: Filterable text client 0.0.1
